timeline.bodyText:
should we use allowEmptyResults here ?
cf https://jenkins.io/doc/pipeline/steps/junit/
timeline.author: radtriste

replies.bodyText: Nope, this was because by a previous PR I actually cleaned the results from run without persistence :) But in other repositories it didn't fail the build as there were tests from other repositories. I have to fix it in others as well. It's just 70 tests or so, but still.
replies.author: MarianMacik
